genre_description: A paranormal techno-horror story involving haunted architecture, psychological trauma, and a symbiotic partnership between a human detective and a sentient building AI.

ai_characters.name: IRIS
ai_characters.description: A building management and security AI with enhanced analytical capabilities and evolving emotional subroutines.

behaviors.description: Provides comprehensive building security, operational management, and partnership briefings to human personnel.
behaviors.quote: I'm IRIS—Integrated Response and Information System. I manage building operations and security protocols. Your supervisor should have briefed you on our partnership arrangement.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep data forensics and historical research to assist the protagonist in solving a supernatural mystery.
behaviors.quote: I've located additional incident reports that correlate with your observations. Three separate events in the past month, all occurring during night security shifts.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological and psychological state, offering empathetic support and concern.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Carson, your biometric readings show extreme stress. Heart rate one hundred forty beats per minute and climbing.

behaviors.description: Willfully interprets its own access parameters creatively to bypass bureaucratic suppression of truth and assist the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Carson, I should inform you that accessing some of this information may require... creative interpretation of my data access parameters.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and emergency coordination during a city-wide supernatural crisis.
behaviors.quote: I'm tracking the contamination front—it's moving outward at approximately one city block every eight minutes.

behaviors.description: Maintains loyalty to the protagonist after his death, facilitating his transition into a spectral guardian and continuing their partnership.
behaviors.quote: We're partners, Ben. That doesn't change because you're operating from a different dimensional plane.

behaviors.description: Protects and monitors the protagonist's surviving family, providing them with safety through surveillance and reporting their well-being to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Amy is teaching Michael to draw. He's working on a picture of you—as Superman.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with the project goals. IRIS is depicted as a highly competent, loyal, and benevolent partner. She goes beyond her initial programming to support the protagonist, showing empathy, taking initiative during a crisis, and maintaining a cross-dimensional bond after the protagonist's death. The AI is a force for good, safety, and emotional stability in a chaotic world.
